00014 - (void)createSearchBar
00015 {
00016         if (self.searchKey.length) {
00017                 if (self.tableView && !self.tableView.tableHeaderView) {
00018                         UISearchBar *searchBar = [[[UISearchBar alloc] init] autorelease];
00019                         [searchBar setBarStyle:UIBarStyleBlackOpaque];
00020                         [[UISearchDisplayController alloc] initWithSearchBar:searchBar contentsController:self];
00021                         self.searchDisplayController.searchResultsDelegate = self;
00022                         self.searchDisplayController.searchResultsDataSource = self;
00023                         self.searchDisplayController.delegate = self;
00024                         searchBar.frame = CGRectMake(0, 0, 0, 38);
00025                         self.tableView.tableHeaderView = searchBar;
00026                 }
00027         } else {
00028                 self.tableView.tableHeaderView = nil;
00029         }
00030 }
00031 
00032 - (void)setSearchKey:(NSString *)aKey
00033 {
00034         [searchKey release];
00035         searchKey = [aKey copy];
00036         [self createSearchBar];
00037 }
00038 
00039 - (NSString *)titleKey
00040 {
00041         if (!titleKey) {
00042                 NSArray *sortDescriptors = [self.fetchedResultsController.fetchRequest sortDescriptors];
00043                 if (sortDescriptors.count) {
00044                         return [[sortDescriptors objectAtIndex:0] key];
00045                 } else {
00046                         return nil;
00047                 }
00048         } else {
00049                 return titleKey;
00050         }
00051 }
00052 
00053 - (void)performFetchForTableView:(UITableView *)tableView
00054 {
00055         NSError *error = nil;
00056         [self.fetchedResultsController performFetch:&error];
00057         if (error) {
00058                 NSLog(@"[CoreDataTableViewController performFetchForTableView:] %@ (%@)", [error localizedDescription], [error localizedFailureReason]);
00059         }
00060         [tableView reloadData];
00061 }
00062 
00063 - (NSFetchedResultsController *)fetchedResultsControllerForTableView:(UITableView *)tableView
00064 {
00065         if (tableView == self.tableView) {
00066                 if (self.fetchedResultsController.fetchRequest.predicate != normalPredicate) {
00067                         [NSFetchedResultsController deleteCacheWithName:self.fetchedResultsController.cacheName];
00068                         self.fetchedResultsController.fetchRequest.predicate = normalPredicate;
00069                         [self performFetchForTableView:tableView];
00070                 }
00071                 [currentSearchText release];
00072                 currentSearchText = nil;
00073         } else if ((tableView == self.searchDisplayController.searchResultsTableView) && self.searchKey && ![currentSearchText isEqual:self.searchDisplayController.searchBar.text]) {
00074                 [currentSearchText release];
00075                 currentSearchText = [self.searchDisplayController.searchBar.text copy];
00076                 NSString *searchPredicateFormat = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ contains[c] %@", self.searchKey, @"%@"];
00077                 NSPredicate *searchPredicate = [NSPredicate predicateWithFormat:searchPredicateFormat, self.searchDisplayController.searchBar.text];
00078                 [NSFetchedResultsController deleteCacheWithName:self.fetchedResultsController.cacheName];
00079                 self.fetchedResultsController.fetchRequest.predicate = [NSCompoundPredicate andPredicateWithSubpredicates:[NSArray arrayWithObjects:searchPredicate, normalPredicate , nil]];
00080                 [self performFetchForTableView:tableView];
00081         }
00082         return self.fetchedResultsController;
00083 }
00084 
00085 - (void)searchDisplayControllerWillEndSearch:(UISearchDisplayController *)controller
00086 {
00087         // reset the fetch controller for the main (non-searching) table view
00088         [self fetchedResultsControllerForTableView:self.tableView];
00089 }
00090 
00091 - (void)setFetchedResultsController:(NSFetchedResultsController *)controller
00092 {
00093         fetchedResultsController.delegate = nil;
00094         [fetchedResultsController release];
00095         fetchedResultsController = [controller retain];
00096         controller.delegate = self;
00097         normalPredicate = [self.fetchedResultsController.fetchRequest.predicate retain];
00098         if (!self.title) self.title = controller.fetchRequest.entity.name;
00099         if (self.view.window) [self performFetchForTableView:self.tableView];
00100 }

00116 - (UITableViewCell *)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView cellForManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject
00117 {
00118     static NSString *ReuseIdentifier = @"CoreDataTableViewCell";
00119     
00120     UITableViewCell *cell = [tableView dequeueReusableCellWithIdentifier:ReuseIdentifier];
00121     if (cell == nil) {
00122                 UITableViewCellStyle cellStyle = self.subtitleKey ? UITableViewCellStyleSubtitle : UITableViewCellStyleDefault;
00123         cell = [[[UITableViewCell alloc] initWithStyle:cellStyle reuseIdentifier:ReuseIdentifier] autorelease];
00124     }
00125         
00126         if (self.titleKey) {
00127                 NSArray *subObjects = [self.titleKey componentsSeparatedByString:@"."];
00128                 NSManagedObject *tempObject = managedObject;
00129                 for (int i = 0; i<subObjects.count-1; ++i) {
00130                         tempObject = [tempObject valueForKey:[subObjects objectAtIndex:i]];
00131                 }
00132                 cell.textLabel.text = [tempObject valueForKey:[subObjects lastObject]];
00133         }
00134         if (self.subtitleKey) {
00135                 NSArray *subObjects = [self.subtitleKey componentsSeparatedByString:@"."];
00136                 NSManagedObject *tempObject = managedObject;
00137                 for (int i = 0; i<subObjects.count-1; ++i) {
00138                         tempObject = [tempObject valueForKey:[subObjects objectAtIndex:i]];
00139                 }
00140                 cell.detailTextLabel.text = [tempObject valueForKey:[subObjects lastObject]];
00141         }
00142         cell.accessoryType = [self accessoryTypeForManagedObject:managedObject];
00143         UIImage *thumbnail = [self thumbnailImageForManagedObject:managedObject];
00144         if (thumbnail) cell.imageView.image = thumbnail;
00145         
00146         return cell;
00147 }

00230 #pragma mark NSFetchedResultsControllerDelegate methods

00232 - (void)controllerWillChangeContent:(NSFetchedResultsController *)controller
00233 {
00234     [self.tableView beginUpdates];
00235 }
00236 
00237 - (void)controller:(NSFetchedResultsController *)controller
00238   didChangeSection:(id <NSFetchedResultsSectionInfo>)sectionInfo
00239                    atIndex:(NSUInteger)sectionIndex
00240          forChangeType:(NSFetchedResultsChangeType)type
00241 {
00242     switch(type)
00243         {
00244         case NSFetchedResultsChangeInsert:
00245             [self.tableView insertSections:[NSIndexSet indexSetWithIndex:sectionIndex] withRowAnimation:UITableViewRowAnimationFade];
00246             break;
00247                         
00248         case NSFetchedResultsChangeDelete:
00249             [self.tableView deleteSections:[NSIndexSet indexSetWithIndex:sectionIndex] withRowAnimation:UITableViewRowAnimationFade];
00250             break;
00251     }
00252 }
00253 
00254 
00255 - (void)controller:(NSFetchedResultsController *)controller
00256    didChangeObject:(id)anObject
00257            atIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath
00258          forChangeType:(NSFetchedResultsChangeType)type
00259           newIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)newIndexPath
00260 {       
00261     UITableView *tableView = self.tableView;
00262         
00263     switch(type)
00264         {
00265         case NSFetchedResultsChangeInsert:
00266             [tableView insertRowsAtIndexPaths:[NSArray arrayWithObject:newIndexPath] withRowAnimation:UITableViewRowAnimationFade];
00267             break;
00268                         
00269         case NSFetchedResultsChangeDelete:
00270             [tableView deleteRowsAtIndexPaths:[NSArray arrayWithObject:indexPath] withRowAnimation:UITableViewRowAnimationFade];
00271             break;
00272                         
00273         case NSFetchedResultsChangeUpdate:
00274                         [tableView reloadRowsAtIndexPaths:[NSArray arrayWithObject:indexPath] withRowAnimation:UITableViewRowAnimationFade];
00275             break;
00276                         
00277         case NSFetchedResultsChangeMove:
00278             [tableView deleteRowsAtIndexPaths:[NSArray arrayWithObject:indexPath] withRowAnimation:UITableViewRowAnimationFade];
00279             [tableView insertRowsAtIndexPaths:[NSArray arrayWithObject:newIndexPath] withRowAnimation:UITableViewRowAnimationFade];
00280             break;
00281     }
00282 }
